content: simple day 9 / 24 christmas wreath additional materials rubber band or macrame ring difficulty time 15 min abbreviations material yarnart jeans hook 2 mm chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch written pattern attach the yarn to the rubber band macrame rope or any other circle round 1 double_crochet around make sure to keep even number of stitches slip_stitch to the first double_crochet of the round total 36 in my wreath round 2 chain 3 skip one stitch and slip_stitch to the second stitch from the hook continue for full round slip_stitch to the same double_crochet as first chains started 18 groups of chains in my wreath weave the ends in take a red yarn and needle go under the second loop outer/top one of every other double_crochet leave some yarn for a bow cut the yarn and tie a bow hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the christmas wreath congratulations you finished the 9th ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 15 to go
